sn56.17:1.1: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn56.17:1.5: “Yam kho, bhikkhu, dukkhe annanam, dukkhasamudaye annanam, dukkhanirodhe annanam, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya annanam—
sn56.17:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhu, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
